1.0.name: wordpress/easy-image-crop
1.0.description:
The Easy Image Crop (EIC) plugin enables a super intuitive WYSIWYG interface that allows you to crop your images in place, meaning that you are cropping your images in the frontend rather than the backend allowing you to see the result instantly.

Installation is very simple. Just download the plugin, install and active. No code or other customizations needed.

Once installed log in to Wordpress as a user with edit_posts permission and browse you website. The plugin adds a little icon to every image that can be cropped through the interface. For now, any image uploaded to the upload directory can be cropped. Click the little icon and an overlay with the original image and a resize frame will show. Drag the image around to place it and drag the bottom right corner of the resize box to resize the image. When happy, click the crop icon and you are done! Easy breezy!

Read more on the Easy Image Crop web site : [Easy Image Crop]:
